name: Shaki Castle
description: {'Location:': ['Shaki Fortress is located in the city of Shaki, in northwestern Azerbaijan, and overlooks magnificent natural landscapes between mountains and valleys.'], 'Key Features:': ['Built in the 18th century to protect the city from invasions.', 'It has thick stone walls and watchtowers.', "It houses the famous Sheki Khan's Palace, known for its stained glass and unique architectural art.", 'A suitable place for history and photography enthusiasts.'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['It is best to visit it in the morning to enjoy the tranquility and natural scenery.', 'Wear comfortable shoes because the area is large and has stone walkways.', "Don't forget to visit the nearby museums and the Khan's Palace located inside the fortress."]}
short_description: An 18th-century historical castle, combining nature and history in the city of Sheki.

name: Karvansaray
description: {'Location:': ["The caravanserai is located in the heart of Sheki, Azerbaijan, near the Sheki Khan's Palace and other historical landmarks. It is considered part of the ancient Silk Road, making it a distinctive historical site."], 'Description:': ['A caravanserai is a historical inn built in the 18th century, serving as a resting stop for merchants and caravans traveling along the Silk Road. It is characterized by its traditional Azerbaijani design with stone walls and tranquil inner courtyards.'], 'Key Features:': ['A historical architectural design reflecting the old Caucasian building style.', 'A beautiful inner courtyard with a fountain, perfect for relaxation.', 'A dining experience in a historical atmosphere inside its traditional restaurant.', 'Hotel rooms offering a heritage stay experience.', "Close to Shaki's most important landmarks, such as the Shaki Khan's Palace."], 'Services and facilities:': ['A restaurant serving traditional Azerbaijani dishes.', 'Old-fashioned guest rooms equipped with modern amenities.', 'A souvenir shop selling local products and handicrafts.'], 'Nearby tourist attractions:': ['Khan Shiki Palace', 'Shiki Historical Museum', 'Old Souk Shaikhi', 'Friday Mosque in Shaki', 'Museum of Handicrafts']}
